item.title: By: valimaties

item.description: It does. My mistake, i used a listbox to debug, but i forgot that listbox convert two slashes into one :)) sorry... It works very good.
item.content:encoded: It does. My mistake, i used a listbox to debug, but i forgot that listbox convert two slashes into one :)) sorry… It works very good.

item.title: By: valimaties

Hy.
